CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 29, 1965, pg. 7 reads: " "Queen Of Beauty Week" - Attractive Mary Williams (seated, wearing crown) won the title of "Queen of Beauty Week," recently. The coronation was the highlight of a gala cabaret party which climaxed a week of festivities celebrating the Beauty Shop Owners and Beauticians' Beauty Week.  Ida Neal was the general chairman.  Standing around the "Queen" are (left to right) Mary Ann Nowlin, chairman of hairstyles; Barbara Ann Moran, Florence Watt, Mozelle Moore, sponsor of the "Queen"; Sir Walter, WAMO deejay, who was the master of ceremonies; Mary Mann and Edith Smith."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Queen of Beauty Week" Mary Williams, seated in front of, from left: Mary Ann Nowlin, Barbara Ann Moran, Florence Watt, Mozelle Moore, John "Sir Walter" Christian, Mary Mann, and Edith Smith, posed in interior with linoleum floors and horizontal striped curtains, another version
